title: LOGIN IN PROBLEMS
body: I cannot login to my account my league of legends client. I can login to the league of legends websites. what is the problems? Please Help?

replies.body:
Hmmmmm if the website is working normally I'd say it's probably an issue where your network is having problems getting a clear signal with our authentication servers. Sometimes the client gets it's signals blocked by firewalls or antivirus so be sure to temporarily turn those off to see if that's the case. 

If that's not fixing it, try adjusting your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 using the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps if you aren't sure, that should be able to get you a smoother signal as well.

From what I've heard it could be a problem with the game and Riot could be fixing it right now, please be patient.

Read this[ article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694) it's about clearing cache to help log-issues. If it doesn't work try changing your password using this article[ here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751734) and re-login after the password change.

If it _still_ doesn't work you could submit a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
